important: Do NOT edit this file or attempt to create new files based on this one. Doing so risks breaking the prompt and producing poor results
name: Tone Changer: Creepy
description: convert a cozy memory into something spooky without changing what happened
prompt:
Take this happy or comfortable memory and write it in a way that makes the memory creepy or eerie to the reader. Don’t change the basic facts of the event, only select a different tone and present it differently.

Text: [Place Text Here]

Rewrite:
PEX:
Take this happy or comfortable memory and write it in a way that makes the memory creepy or eerie to the reader. Don’t change the basic facts of the event, only select a different tone and present it differently.

Text: I went to the grocery store and ran into a friend I haven't seen in a long time. We hugged and talked for a while, catching up on life.

Rewrite:

I went to the grocery store and ran into a friend I haven't seen in a long time. We hugged, and I could feel his icy breath on my skin. His eyes were cold and hard, and I felt a chill run down my spine. We talked for a while, catching up on life, and I could feel his gaze boring into me the whole time.
